Module nbbrd.picocsv
Package nbbrd.picocsv

Interface Csv.LineReader

All Superinterfaces:
CharSequence
All Known Implementing Classes:
Csv.Reader
Enclosing class:
Csv
public static interface Csv.LineReader extends CharSequence
CSV line reader. This interface describes all the read operations available on a CSV line.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • readField

      boolean readField() throws IOException
      Reads the next field.
      Returns:
      true if not at the end of line, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs

    • isComment

      boolean isComment()
      Check if the current line is a comment or not.
      Returns:
      true if the current line is a comment, false otherwise

    • isQuoted

      boolean isQuoted()
      Check if the current field is a quoted or not.
